LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.hideous_environment.de: This place is unbearable. Get me out of here...
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.ugly_environment.label: very ugly environment
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.ugly_environment.descr: This place is really unpleasant. I don't want to be here.
This place is unpleasant to be in.
I really like this place. It's beautiful.
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.gorgeous_environment.d: This place is beautiful. It lifts me up and makes me love life.
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.uncomfortable.label: uncomfortable
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.uncomfortable.descrip: I've been kind of uncomfortable recently. We need to get something soft to sit on around here.
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.comfortable.label: comfortable
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.extremely_comfortable: I've been extremely comfortable recently. This place is so cushy!
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.luxuriantly_comfortab: I am resting on clouds of heaven.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.hungry.label: hungry
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.ravenously_hungry.label: urgently hungry
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.ravenously_hungry.descri: These hunger pangs are hard to ignore.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.malnourished.label: starving (trivial)
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.malnourished.description: It's been so long since I ate. I'm all fuzzy and it's hard to focus.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.badly_malnourished.label: starving (minor)
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.badly_malnourished.descr: I can feel my body wasting away. My stomach hurts like never before.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.starving.label: starving (moderate)
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.starving.description: I can barely think about anything but food. My skin is stretching over my bones. Am I going to die?
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.advanced_starvation.desc: I can barely move or think about anything but food. My stomach hurts like never before. I feel like I'm going to pass out.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.extreme_starvation.label: starving (extreme)
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.extreme_starvation.descr: Food... food... just a bite to eat... anything... please...
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreationstarved.label: totally joy-deprived
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreationstarved.descrip: It's been so long since I did anything I truly enjoyed.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreationdeprived.label: very joy-deprived
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreationdeprived.descri: I never get to relax and enjoy myself around here.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreation_unfulfilled.de: I could really use a break for something enjoyable.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreation_satisfied.desc: I've been having a great time here recently.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreation_fully_satisfie: I've been enjoying myself so much, I love it!
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.cabin_fever.label: TODO
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.stuck_indoors.label: TODO
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.drowsy.label: tired
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.drowsy.description: I haven't slept in a while.
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.tired.label: very tired
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.tired.description: I'm so tired. I just want to lay down and rest for a few minutes...
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.exhausted.label: exhausted
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.exhausted.description: I'm so exhausted I can barely stand. My eyelids have lead weights on them. Let me sleep...
LanguageData.NeedSpace.stages.0.label: very cramped interior
LanguageData.NeedSpace.stages.0.description: I feel like a rat in a tiny cage.
LanguageData.NeedSpace.stages.1.label: cramped interior
LanguageData.NeedSpace.stages.1.description: I wish I had more space to move around and breathe.
LanguageData.NeedSpace.stages.2.label: spacious interior
LanguageData.NeedSpace.stages.2.description: This is a really comfortably open indoor space.
